name: Helen_Northrup
text:
Helen Northrup
Helen Northrup was the first wife of Jack Parsons.
She and Parsons divorced sometime after he began an affair with her younger half-sister, Betty. By December 1949, she had remarried.
Behind the scenes
Mary Helen Northrup (February 6, 1910 – July 27, 2003) was the first wife of rocket engineer and occultist Jack Parsons.
The pair were married from April 1935 until 1946. She was in a relationship with fellow Thelemite Wilfred Talbot Smith from 1942 until his death in 1957.
